tool_description: Calculates actual setback distances from property boundaries to structures and compares them against required minimums for all property sides.

property_boundaries.description: Property boundary coordinates as array of coordinate pairs

structure_locations.description: Structure corner coordinates as array of coordinate pairs

required_setbacks.description: Required setbacks in feet for front, side, side, rear

include_projections.description: Whether to include building projections like eaves

accessory_structures.description: Coordinates of accessory structures if present

error_messages: Invalid boundary coordinates: Property boundaries must form a closed polygon with at least 3 points.
Invalid structure coordinates: Structure locations must be valid coordinate pairs within property boundaries.
Required setbacks missing: Must specify setback requirements for all four property sides.
Measurement unit error: Units must be either 'feet' or 'meters'.
Geometric calculation error: Unable to calculate setbacks due to invalid geometric data.
usage: Provide property boundary coordinates, structure locations, and required setbacks to calculate compliance. Include accessory structures and projections for comprehensive analysis.

violations.description: List of setback violations if any
